name: odbc_columnprivileges
purpose: Lists columns and associated privileges for the given table

return.description:
Returns an ODBC result identifier or FALSE on failure.
   This result identifier can be used to fetch a list of columns and
   associated privileges.The result set has the following columns:
   
    TABLE_QUALIFIER
    TABLE_OWNER
    TABLE_NAME
    GRANTOR
    GRANTEE
    PRIVILEGE
    IS_GRANTABLEThe result set is ordered by TABLE_QUALIFIER, TABLE_OWNER and
   TABLE_NAME.
